akas: Stay with Me USA (literal translation of working title)
akas from release info: Stay with Me USA (literal translation of working title)

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: After a sensational first meeting with David, Eva gets in an unpleasant situation and seeks comfort in the arms of another man. Laura and Adi face all kinds of problems with their marriage, and Mona is looking for the man of her dreams.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: While Eva is trying hard to get closer to David, in another part of the city a romance starts on a dating site. Laura gets drunk after she spends a "girls night out" with her friend.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Mona and Adi begin a romance in the dark, in a hotel room, and the love story between Eva and David seems to end before it starts. Dorina feels attracted to Laura.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Mona finds out that Adi is married and leaves him. Eva gives up on David and decides to meet her dad at all costs.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: David undertakes a job at the advertising agency where Eva works and has trouble facing Iasmina's nervous breakdowns. Mona continues her meetings in the dark. Laura and Adrian have a new quarrel.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Mona's surgery is not going as it should and everyone is worried. Eva meets a charming stranger and she feels attracted to him.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Iasmina organizes a party for David's colleagues and to find out information about Eva. Mona is in the hospital in a coma, and her sister is making a pass at Virgil.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Mona finally wakes up from the coma. Eva goes with Tony to Toscana but not before stopping at the advertising agency and having a fight with David.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Eva finds out who her father is and Mona discovers the true identity of her secret lover.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Mona and Adrian are both suffering due to their relationship. Eva decides to pay a visit to her father.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Adrian discovers the identity of the mysterious woman he had been seeing, Eva breaks up with Tony. Iasmina has found out something disturbing.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Adrian moves away from home and Mona finally understand why she keeps craving ice cream. David is very upset with Eva, and she doesn't understands why. Iasmina has a secret she is not willing to share with David.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: An unhappy accident finally brings Eva and David together. Adrian goes to India, and Mona and Virgil find happiness together.

imdb.plot outline: All 13 episodes of the HBO series are, actually, about the human nature: how we discover people the way they are, essentially, with their passions, illusions, fears, loneliness, uncertainty and their dreams. The series talks about human relationships, but first of all, about the relationship with themselves. The city is not just the background of all these stories, but also a character that lives intensely and vibrates with every action. Laura is a married woman who refuses to see the cracks in her relationship and she is looking for a way to feel loved again. Adrian, her husband, is always looking elsewhere, for something that she can't offer him, and he jumps in a relationship with a mysterious woman he meets in the dark, in hotel rooms. When this mysterious woman comes into his life everything changes. Eva, the former mistress of Adrian, who's trying to find her father, has an extremely tense relationship with her mother, Silvia; she falls in love with David, the man of her dreams. But meanwhile, Iasmina, a woman as interesting as she is manipulative, manages to "catch" him before Eva and wants to keep him for herself at any cost. Mona is Laura's friend. She is a shy accountant, not very attractive, but with a big heart, who is in constant search of impossible relationships with men she meets online. Her life gets complicated when she starts a relation with a man that she doesn't know. She is so consumed by this fantasy that she can't even notice Virgil, the marketing manager at her clinic, a shy man who is very much in love with her and who is always by her side.
imdb.title: Rãmâi cu mine
